TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UITableViewCellEditingStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of editing styles for a cell.
Docs.remarks: The editing style of a cell is set on the property. The editing control is displayed on the left hand side of the cell when it is in editing mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellEditingStyle Delete = int64(1)

Docs.summary: A red circle with a white minus sign is displayed, to indicate the cell can be deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellEditingStyle Insert = int64(2)

Docs.summary: A gree circle with a white plus sign is displayed, indicating a new row can be inserted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellEditingStyle None = int64(0)

Docs.summary: No editing control is displayed in the cell (this is the default).
